argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fsumneg.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | fsumneg.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> -u 1 e. CC ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_fsummulc2 | |- ( ph -> ( -u 1 x. sum_ k e. A B ) = sum_ k e. A ( -u 1 x. B ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_fsumcl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. CC ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_mulm1d | |- ( ph -> ( -u 1 x. sum_ k e. A B ) = -u sum_ k e. A B ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_mulm1d | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> ( -u 1 x. B ) = -u B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_sumeq2dv | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A ( -u 1 x. B ) = sum_ k e. A -u B ) |
| 10 | 5, 7, 9 | #P_3eqtr3rd | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A -u B = -u sum_ k e. A B ) |
